data.name: Two Worlds Digital Deluxe Content
data.detailed_description:
This Digital Deluxe Content reveals the artistic impressions of the game and offers you an incredibly entertaining journey into the fantastic scenario of Two Worlds.

On 82 pages the Digital Artbook offers you an extraordinary opportunity to immerse yourself in a world full of breathtaking details! The four exklusive In-Game Items make it easier for you to get into the game.

With quick action entertainment, the Two Worlds Pinball will give you the opportunity to experience the Two Worlds Universe in a different way.

The TWO WORLDS DIGITAL DELUXE CONTENT includes:

  • The Art of Two Worlds:
    • Digital Artbook (82 Pages, PDF Format)
    • Full-HD Wallpaper
    • Moveshots & MoCap Videos
  • 4 exclusive In-Game Items (Valermos - Sword of Fire, Armor of Darkness, Spear of Destiny and The Great Bow of Heaven's Fury)
  • Two Worlds Pinball (Windows only)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Single Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Hard Drive: 1 GB Free Space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Hard Drive: 1.5 GB Free Space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse, Broadband Internet Connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Mac Single Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB
  • Graphics: Any, OS compatible
  • Hard Drive: 1 GB Free Space
  • Sound: Any, OS compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Mac Dual Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Any, OS compatible
  • Hard Drive: 1.5 GB Free Space
  • Sound: Any, OS compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse, Broadband Internet Connection

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB
  • Graphics: Any, OS compatible
  • Hard Drive: 1 GB Free Space
  • Sound: Any, OS compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse
